roleset.name: generally large

example.name: both args
example.text: Up, and to the office, where all the morning busy, and so dined with my people at home, and then to the King’s playhouse, and there saw “The Silent Woman;” the best comedy, I think, that ever was wrote; and sitting by Shadwell the poet, he was big with admiration of it.

example.name: just arg1
example.text: Hurry up, the world is very big!

example.name: comparative alias
example.text: I want the surge to be BIGGER , SOONER , and to last as long as it takes to WIN .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1.

roleset.name: magnanimous, generous

example.name: concatenation, empty it
example.text: It was big of him to help out like that.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.

roleset.name: trendy, important

example.name: with LOC
example.text: Joe Johnson Is Very Big in China

example.name: both args
example.text: I live in Stratford, which-1 *PRO*-1 is very big with tourists because it's beautiful and where Shakespeare comes from.
example.arg: because it's beautiful and where Shakespeare comes from

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet.
